description:
There are a lot of top level domains that are used for purposes outside of what it was a originally made for, country code top level domains are a prime example of this with .ai, .tv, .gg and our topic for today .io, which due to a British treaty may end up being dissolved.

title: When A Top Level Domain Outlives Its Country
